attributes.action: A law for NO descrimination against anyone without a vaccine or vaccine passport
attributes.additional_details: I feel that it is an invasion of my human rights, an invasion of my privacy and a violation of my body. I, myself should be the only one deciding what I do with my body, and no-one else!!
attributes.background: Need a law passed that anyone who refuses and doesn't have a vaccine is not descriminated against, in the place of work, shops or any other public place.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
